title: fiulpro
author: fiulpro
content: Are you looking for a personalized artwork? *If it's showing invalid proxy, please click on it sometimes it takes ages to load* *I got loads of artworks for you if you need more information regarding my art style* Maybe a tiny little hamster?Or the cute pictures that you see on Instagram? Some different style?Or an old abstract with plenty of coffee stains ?It can be a scenery Or an abstract Or some tiny doodle?Hey ! Gald to have grabbed your attention. I have commissioned loads of artworks, 4 on the forum actually, cannot ofcourse discuss the details since privacy is absolutely essential, other than that these are the tiny artworks that I comissioned for friends and family. I do know that it's really important for everyone to have their own personalized artwork,Art is a form of expression! It's bounds are endless, what I can offer is : ❌ Judgement✅ Right Price 🤍 Fair trade " You just have to pay 10% before I start working on your desired masterpiece" 💯% satisfaction, I will redo it once more if it did not fit your standards🔜 EMERGENCY services! 🌈My weird art style added to fit your preference. Currently am looking for work ofcourse and would like to offer discounts on the first 5 artworks so that they can leave a good review down this post. ☀️ Willing to do the first 5 artworks with 10$ each, remember art is not 🚫 just copying someone else's face on paper, we got camera for that, every artist does have their own individual style thus would appreciate it exceedingly If you keep that in mind ☀️ 💫 Additional details can be discussed on telegram or in messages.
